kw.name: Close Browser And Capture On Failure
Run Keyword If Test Failed
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
Log Source
kw.msg:
Unable to connect

Firefox can’t establish a connection to the server at localhost:4200.

What can you do about it?

  • The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments.
  • If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer’s network connection.
  • If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the web.

Learn more…

You can continue with your default DNS resolver. However, a third-party might be able to see what websites you visit.

Learn more…

It looks like your network security settings might be causing this. Do you want the default settings to be restored?

View Certificate
kw.doc: Logs and returns the HTML source of the current page or frame.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

Log Source
kw.msg:
Unable to connect

Firefox can’t establish a connection to the server at localhost:4200.

What can you do about it?

  • The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments.
  • If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer’s network connection.
  • If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the web.

Learn more…

You can continue with your default DNS resolver. However, a third-party might be able to see what websites you visit.

Learn more…

It looks like your network security settings might be causing this. Do you want the default settings to be restored?

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Checkbox Should Be Selected
kw.doc: Verifies checkbox ``locator`` is selected/checked.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Unselect Checkbox
kw.doc: Removes the selection of checkbox identified by ``locator``.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Checkbox Should Not Be Selected
kw.doc: Verifies checkbox ``locator`` is not selected/checked.

kw.name: Select Checkbox
kw.doc: Selects the checkbox identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Checkbox Should Be Selected
kw.doc: Verifies checkbox ``locator`` is selected/checked.

kw.name: Close Browser And Capture On Failure
Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
